summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the Director of Engineering to execute an Exxon Oil Rebate Program Agreement with the Washington State Department of Transportation for ten Signal Optimization projects; authorizing acceptance of the Exxon Oil Rebate Program funds; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1988 budget of the Engineering Department; and making appropriations from the Engineering Operation Fund and the Arterial City Street Fund for the design and construction of the Signal Optimization projects.
